author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Lei-Ke Zhang, zhangleike@wh.iov.cn, or Gengfu Xiao, xiaogf@wh.iov.cn.

fn.p: Citation Zhu S, Wan W, Zhang Y, Shang W, Pan X, Zhang L-K, Xiao G. 2019. Comprehensive interactome analysis reveals that STT3B is required for N-glycosylation of Lassa virus glycoprotein. J Virol 93:e01443-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.01443-19.
